short.ar: Dots and Lines هي لعبة ألغاز HTML5 حيث يرسم اللاعبون خطوطًا بين النقاط لإنشاء حلقات مغلقة وملء المناطق.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dots and Lines is an HTML5 puzzle game where players draw lines between dots to create closed loops and fill in the areas.
In Dots and Lines, players must use their coordination and strategic thinking skills to complete increasingly challenging levels. The game plays on a grid of dots. And the objective is to draw lines between the dots to create closed loops and fill in the areas. As players progress through the game, the number and complexity of the sizes increase, making completing them more challenging.
One of the critical features of Dots and Lines is its intuitive and easy-to-use controls. Players can draw lines between the dots by clicking and dragging their mouse or finger. This allows for fast and fluid gameplay that is easy to pick up and play.
In addition to the standard game mode, Dots and Lines also includes a variety of challenging levels. And game modes to keep players coming back for more. In the Puzzle mode, players must use their strategic thinking skills to solve increasingly tricky levels. Endlessly, players must stay alive for as long as possible, completing areas as quickly as possible to keep the dots from filling up the screen.
Overall, Dots and Lines is a fun and addictive HTML5 game that keeps players entertained for hours. Its challenging gameplay, various game modes, and easy-to-use controls make it a must-play for anyone looking for a brain-teasing and engaging game.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Dots And Lines Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
